sources.title: The Huns | Full Movie | Action Adventure
sources.description:
The Huns - It was a primitive time long ago when the nomadic tribes of the Huns ruled the Great Steppes. After her clan is destroyed, Hora is taken captive but secretly plans to seek her revenge. In this barbaric world of violent warriors and ritualistic shamans, she must devise a plan to survive and seek her retribution. Only the strong will live to tell this tale.
2021.  Stars: Sergey Bara, Ivan Bezborodov, Berik Burmakov
